actions.text: On agreeing to the Jordan amendment (A048) Failed by recorded vote: 150 - 281 (Roll no. 570).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A048) offered by Mr. Jordan.
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Jordan amendment (A048) Failed by recorded vote: 150 - 281 (Roll no. 570).

description: Page 111, after line 17, insert the following:    TITLE VI--ADDITIONAL GENERAL PROVISIONS    SEC. 601. Each amount appropriated or otherwise made available by this Act that is not required to be appropriated or otherwise made available by a provision of law is reduced by 4.3 percent.
purpose: An amendment numbered 22 printed in the Congressional Record to provide that each amount appropriated or otherwise made available by this Act that is not required to be appropriated or otherwise made available by a provision of law is reduced by 4.3 percent.
